name: xmlrpc-jukebox
short_description: A pluggable jukebox, in which the components talk XMLRPC to one another. This lets you have multiple UIs, multiple player types, multiple queueing systems. The ultimate conclusion would be a build your own jukebox kit. Includes a back end that Gronk! can
